title: Mason Hut
technology: React Js,Tailwind CSS,React Router,React Query,Firebase,Node Js,Mongodb,JWT,Heroku,Stripe,React Toastify,React firebase hooks
features: This is a manufacturer company based application.
functionalities: The website is a manufaacturer based in ehich the users can easily interact bry signing up.Users can order a minimum quantity of products in the desired location,can make payment throug Stripe(payment gateway),and can cancel the order anytime if it is not paid.The users are also able to post a review based on overall services.There are admin roles available on the website.An admin can make another user a admin .An admin can manage the order and its status and also can add or delete an product anytime.Every api is protected using JWT on the server-side .Also in the client side the route is protected for the user and admin.

title: Daily Deals
technology: React Js,Tailwind CSS,React Router,Firebase,Node Js,Mongodb,JWT,Heroku,React Toastify,React firebase hooks
features: This is a warehouse management based application.
functionalities: This site is made for storing products globally from different traders to deal with one trading.Users can easily store and make a fair trade among them.Also,security concerns are provided for the user's privacy  and data.Sellers can update the product quantity and also can add a new product to the websitee whenever needed.

title: Healthy Bite
technology: React Js,Bootstrap,React Bootstrap,React Router,Firebase,React Toastify,React firebase hooks
features: This is a Consultation service based application.
functionalities: The uses can simplu start exloring just signing up with and email password base / Google sign-in authentication method.The user can order the product available on the website.Users van use the consultation dervices virtually or atttedn physically.Users can take subscriptions in a particular time period for specific services.
